text: [Chapter 20b] [Nolavillian Mountain Range, Northern Nolavillia]

speaker: left
text: We'll be passing through the Nolavillian Mountain Range soon.

speaker: left
text: The path through the mountain range is very narrow, keep on guard for ambushes.

speaker: left
text: And it seems there's already a group of people ahead of us, likely trying to ambush us...
???: You! State your purpose!

speaker: left
text: We're here to retrieve the Holy Itucher.
???: Thats must mean the Holy Itucher is past this mountain range...
???: Though I appreciate your help, we must kill you.
???: We're here to obtain the Holy Itucher for prince Neo of Shade, and it would be troublesome if you found it before us.

speaker: right
text: I've... lost... ?

speaker: right
text: I won't... let you get... any more... information...
[Dael disintegrates himself with a spell]
Proton...

speaker: right
text: Umm... we're not that loyal, can we stay alive? We could work for you.
[Recruit the Shadian soldiers?] (Q) Recruit (W) Do not recruit
(Proton defeats the rest of the soldiers)
???: You've helped me greatly, Proton.

speaker: left
text: Who are you?.
???: I am Revolt, and you have just defeated Dael and his army for me.

speaker: right
text: I'm in a very good mood today, so I'll grant you this...
[Proton learned Aura]
(Revolt disappears)
[Xuirist Cavern]

speaker: left
text: Preperations are now complete.

speaker: right
text: Good.

speaker: right
text: We'll kill every last one of them fools.

speaker: right
text: Those who oppose lord Prime shall no longer live...

speaker: right
text: And the Holy Itucher shall finally become ours!

speaker: right
text: And one more thing...

speaker: right
text: *They* must partake in the battle.

speaker: right
text: No excuses. Either they partake or I'll destroy them myself.

speaker: right
text: Which would you rather want, Omega?
[Chapter 21a] [Nolavillian Mountain Range, Northern Nolavillia]
